A certain degree of mystery attaches to the three fragments edited from the Turin collection by Pfaff; not at all however in consequence of any doubt that can affect the editor's account of how, when, and where he obtained them; but by reason of the entire disappearance of the Codices from whence they were taken. The fragments in question were published at the Hagne an. 1715; in 1749 the ²catalogue of the Turin collection was printed, and its editors, after diligent search through various Caras, could find no trace of them.
